title: Chickamauga & Chattanooga National Military Park: Pets
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Pets              Pets          Pets are more than welcome in the park. However, please remember to keep them leashed at all times. Also, please remember that owners and persons having custody or control of any animal(s), within 500 feet of visitor centers and the Cravens House will need to remove and dispose of excrement voided by an animal(s) under their control. Excrement will need to be properly disposed of in trash containers. This rule also applies to Point Park, on Lookout Mountain, in its entirety. Only service animals are allowed in the park visitor centers (Chickamauga Battlefield and Lookout Mountain Battlefield - Point Park).
